title: Get bibliographic data from your Zotero Library
author: Diego
workflow_json:

readme:
## What this template does

This workflow will read your Zotero Library and extract Meta Data from the articles of one collection in your bibliography. You can personalize the output for optimized results.

## How it works

Mainly, follow the instructions in the Post it notes:

  1. Go to <https://www.zotero.org/settings/security> and find your USER ID (It's right under the APPLICATIONS Section.
  2. On the same website, create a New Private Key.
  3. In the "Collections" Node, select Generic Credential Type > Header Auth > Create New Credential using:


  * NAME: Zotero-API-Key
  * VALUE: [Your Private Key]


  1. Run your Flow to check if it works and open the "Select Collection" node.
  2. See the Results of the previous node as TABLE and copy the "KEY" of the collection you want to use.



After that you should have a working flow that reads your bibliography.

You can edit or delete the last 2 nodes to personalize your results (Filter and Edit Fields)
readme_html:
What this template does

This workflow will read your Zotero Library and extract Meta Data from the articles of one collection in your bibliography. You can personalize the output for optimized results.

How it works

Mainly, follow the instructions in the Post it notes:

  1. Go to https://www.zotero.org/settings/security and find your USER ID (It's right under the APPLICATIONS Section.
  2. On the same website, create a New Private Key.
  3. In the "Collections" Node, select Generic Credential Type > Header Auth > Create New Credential using:
  • NAME: Zotero-API-Key
  • VALUE: [Your Private Key]
  1. Run your Flow to check if it works and open the "Select Collection" node.
  2. See the Results of the previous node as TABLE and copy the "KEY" of the collection you want to use.

After that you should have a working flow that reads your bibliography.

You can edit or delete the last 2 nodes to personalize your results (Filter and Edit Fields)
readme_zh:
## 模板功能说明

本工作流将读取您的Zotero文献库，并从指定文献集合中提取元数据。您可自定义输出格式以获得最佳效果。

## 操作指南

请按照便签提示逐步操作：

1. 访问<https://www.zotero.org/settings/security>，在"应用程序"栏目下方查找您的用户ID
2. 在同一页面创建新的私有密钥
3. 在"Collections"节点中：选择通用凭证类型 > Header验证 > 使用以下信息创建新凭证：

   * 名称: Zotero-API-Key  
   * 值: [您的私有密钥]

4. 运行流程测试是否正常工作，然后打开"Select Collection"节点
5. 以表格形式查看前一节点结果，复制目标文献集合的"KEY"值

完成上述步骤后，您将获得可正常读取文献库的工作流。最后两个节点（筛选器和字段编辑器）可根据需要修改或删除以定制输出结果。
title_zh: 从您的Zotero库中获取书目数据
